author: Wes Fenlon
description: Phantom Blade Zero is, thankfully, not a timed PlayStation exclusive.
title: The most promising action game of 2026 finally has a release date, and we now know it'll launch on PC day one

author: Andy Chalk
description: If you still want to play it, here's your chance.
title: Hogwarts Legacy goes free for the first time to kick off the Epic Games Store's 2025 Holiday Sale

author: Andy Chalk
description: Alix Wilton Regan adds Tomb Raider to her long list of credits.
title: The new voice of Lara Croft is a veteran of Cyberpunk 2077, Lies of P, Dragon Age, Assassin's Creed, and a whole bunch more

author: Lauren Morton
description: Larian is returning to its own original fantasy setting with a dark, horrifying new RPG and everything it learned from Baldur's Gate 3.
title: Divinity: everything we know about Larian's 'most ambitious rpg yet'

author: Wes Fenlon
description: "That's not a body double."
title: Yes, IO Interactive really scanned Lenny Kravitz's incredible sculpted abs for his 007 First Light character model

author: Wes Fenlon
description: Warhorse Studios had its memes ready for a win or a loss.
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 devs tweet 'Blame the French!' after losing every Game Awards category to Clair Obscur, but it was in good fun: They partied together after

author: Andy Chalk
description: Geoff Keighley went hard on the hype for Highguard, but it wasn't very convincing.
title: Internet not convinced it should care about another PvP hero shooter, collective eye-roll plunges big Game Awards finale reveal into a YouTube dislikes hole

author: Ted Litchfield
description: Rise and shine.
title: The 9 biggest no-shows at The Game Awards 2025

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: More than 10% of games from this year haven't been reviewed at all.
title: More than 19,000 games launched on Steam this year—but almost half have fewer than 10 reviews

author: Robin Valentine
description: The studio's newly announced game takes us back to Rivellon.
title: Is a return to the Divinity series the right move for Larian after Baldur's Gate 3? Our team of RPG fans is divided

author: Joshua Wolens
description: A big disturbance in the Force.
title: 'We have spooked Disney legal': Court filings reveal a KOTOR 2 remake stuck in the phantom zone, who's working on the KOTOR 1 remake, plus Aspyr's doomed efforts to get the Restored Content Mod past anxious lawyers

author: Dave James
description: No living with messy cables when they're retractable, eh?
title: You got the juice now, man. Well, so long as you remember to pick up this half-price charger for all your devices this holiday anyways

author: Harvey Randall
description: Hey, cinematic designers—you guys okay?
title: Divinity's trailer is cool, but I suspect Larian's body-horror Burning Man splatfest doesn't set an accurate tone for the full game—and if I'm right, it'll be weird that it's happened twice

author: Sean Martin
description: Get all the details about Total War's upcoming venture into the 41st millennium.
title: Total War: Warhammer 40k—Everything we know about the series' upcoming grimdark instalment

author: Jeremy Laird
description: Well, it certainly hasn't been all good news for PC gamers!
title: OpenAI is now 10 years old, but how well has its mission statement to "benefit all humanity" aged?

author: Jacob Ridley
description: PhysX matters, ya know.
title: I've tested PhysX now that it's sorta supported on the RTX 50 series and I'm more convinced than ever it's a feature worth fighting for

author: Elie Gould
description: Aggression-based matchmaking confirmed?
title: Your bloodlust does have consequences in Arc Raiders, as a dev confirms, 'we do analyse behaviour and match accordingly'

author: Sean Martin
description: Explore the new area added in the 'Thank You update'.
title: Where to find Versos Drafts in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

author: Jess Kinghorn
description: A last minute deal for your last minute gift shopping.
title: The WD_Black SN850X is a great fit for a gaming PC and a great deal at $159

author: Elie Gould
description: Where there's a will, there's probably a wallhack.
title: 'Quite a few things have taken us by surprise': Arc Raiders' wallhacks caught the devs off-guard as heaps of greedy players hunted for exploits

author: Jacob Ridley
description: A so-called stablecoin collapsed back in 2022.
title: Crypto boss sentenced to 15 years over 'epic, generational scale' fraud that lost over 40 billion dollars

author: Harvey Randall
description: C'est généreux!
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 developers are so thankful for the awards, they dropped a big stonking DLC for free that you can go play right now, with some clutch quality-of-life updates, too

author: Lauren Morton
description: If you missed the live show, here's the biggest stuff you missed—assuming the group chat hasn't already been typing in all caps to give you the news.
title: The 5 biggest announcements and trailers from The Game Awards 2025

author: Tyler Wilde
description: This year's Game Awards GOTY (and almost everything else) is the popular French RPG Clair Obscur: Expedition 33.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 takes home an absurd 9 wins at The Game Awards, more than Baldur's Gate 3 in 2023

author: Christopher Livingston
description: You're just being mean.
title: C'mon, Remedy, you can't use the words 'Rise and Shine' in your TGA trailer—don't you know you're hurting all those hopeful fans in r/Halflife?

author: Ted Litchfield
description: Now THIS is [not technically] podracing.
title: No pods in sight, but Star Wars: Galactic Racer still looks rad

author: Mollie Taylor
description: King of Fighters and Tekken's influence is clear.
title: Screamer's multi-lingual anime inspiration comes from a love of fighting games: 'We really like them, even the weird ones'

author: Mollie Taylor
description: New vibes, same feel.
title: While some aren't happy about the new Screamer going all-in on anime vibes, its director says the 'essence' of the original is still present: 'This is still Screamer'

author: Tyler Wilde
description: This is the first new main series Ace Combat game in seven years.
title: Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve is coming to Steam and consoles in 2026

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: What could be better than this?
title: Werner Herzog explaining Warframe is the highlight of The Game Awards

author: Jody Macgregor
description: In the grim darkness of the far future, there is Total War.
title: The rumors were true, Creative Assembly really is making Total War: Warhammer 40,000

author: Tyler Wilde
description: No Law comes from the developer of popular cyberpunk game The Ascent.
title: Open world RPG shooter No Law is going straight on my wishlist after its Game Awards reveal—we spoke to the devs to find out more

author: Ted Litchfield
description: Forest 3 has my attention.
title: That sick-looking first person sci-fi game at The Game Awards is actually the sequel to Sons of the Forest

author: Tyler Colp
description: Paladins aren't the only exciting things coming in the Lord of Hatred expansion.
title: Diablo 4's age of reworks might finally be over with its next expansion as it plans to deliver major features players have wanted for years

author: Tyler Colp
description: Lord of Hatred will bring not one, but two new classes to the game.
title: Diablo 4's highly anticipated paladin class is playable today, before its second expansion launches next year

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Good thing Geoff opted for the big stage.
title: I think The Game Awards just broke the record for most people presenting a single award, with the entire cast of the Street Fighter movie announcing 'Best Ongoing Game'

author: Joshua Wolens
description: Which is quite a lot of puzzles, if you ask me.
title: Jonathan Blow's new game has the most 'Jonathan Blow's new game' pitch imaginable: A 'game design supercollider' that takes 4 puzzle games and jams them together into a 500-hour saga

author: Andy Chalk
description: Lara Croft is back.
title: Tomb Raider comes to The Game Awards with not just one but two new games: a 're-imagining' and an all-new adventure

author: Andy Chalk
description: Turns out the new Resident Evil is a two-way teamup.
title: Resident Evil Requiem will have Leon S. Kennedy as its second protagonist, and he's bringing his sick roundhouse with him

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Frictional Games revealed a new "mind-bending narrative mystery" at The Game Awards.
title: A weird sci-fi thriller starring Stellan Skarsgård? That takes place in a hotel on the moon? From the makers of SOMA? Yeah, I'm in

author: Jody Macgregor
description: How many problems can I solve with eldritch blast this time?
title: The next official D&D videogame won't be anything like Baldur's Gate 3: 'We're making a third-person action-adventure open world game that focuses on the warlock'

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Don't shoot the messenger.
title: I'm sad to report that you cannot romance the space octopus in Exodus, the Matthew McConaughey-starring space opera RPG from former BioWare devs

author: Ted Litchfield
description: The news was slightly spoiled by a trademark filing spotted earlier this week.
title: Larian reveals Divinity, its 'biggest game ever,' that will be 'even larger than Baldur's Gate 3'

author: Ted Litchfield
description: Emotionally, I am in middle school again.
title: After 21 years, Knights of the Old Republic's original director is returning to the series for Fate of the Old Republic

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: I simply wouldn't be in the horrible castle to begin with. Seems like a skill issue.
title: Decrepit is a 'dark fantasy first person soulslike' in a castle full of zombies who'll repeatedly drag your clobbered body back to the dungeons until you get good enough to escape

author: Rich Stanton
description: You ain't never had a friend like me.
title: Disney quaffs the Kool-Aid with a $1 billion investment in OpenAI that will see its most iconic characters used to generate AI slop
